name: Bartender Simulator
description:
Game made for ZED-Game-Jam 2020

A short, simple game where your task is to keep customers happy by serving them beer. You can buy more tables, hire more employees and improve your speed to serve people faster.

Controls: In game:
  • Right click on tables that have waiting customers to serve them
  • Left click to buy upgrades between days
  • Escape button to open menu
In menu:
  • Escape button to exit game
Outside assets used:
  • Sounds: https://www.humblebundle.com/software/rpg-game-dev-bundle
